TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WorkflowSchedulerService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowRuntimeService
Public MustInherit Class WorkflowSchedulerService Inherits WorkflowRuntimeService

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 提供一种机制，通过该机制可实现您自己的线程池，从而执行工作流并管理内存中计时器注册和事件。

span.span: Provides a mechanism to implement your own thread pool to execute the workflow and manage in-memory timer registration and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 对于创建在工作流运行时引擎宿主上运行工作流实例的线程的类， 是所有这些类的基类。 is that base class for all classes that create threads that run workflow instances on the workflow runtime engine host. 包括 和 。These include and .

para.span: 当从 继承时，必须重写以下成员：、 和 。

span.span: When you inherit from , you must override the following members: , and .

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建 对象（继承自 ）的实例并将其添加到运行时。The following example demonstrates creating an instance of a object (that inherits from ) and adding it to the runtime. 此示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的“嵌套异常处理程序 SDK”示例。This example is from the Nested Exception Handlers SDK sample, from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[嵌套异常处理程序示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265)。For more information, see [Nested Exception Handlers Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d1da0209-842b-41c8-9b7c-0cbaa1034265). summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，取消具有给定 的计划工作项。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, cancels the scheduled work item with the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从挂起工作项队列中移除先前用于计划工作流实例的请求。 removes from the pending work items queue a previous request to schedule a workflow instance.

summary.span: 由运行时调用，用于请求新的线程来运行工作流实例。

span.span: Called by the runtime to request a new thread to run a workflow instance.

param.name: callback
param.span: 一个 多路广播委托，表示要运行的方法。

span.span: A multicast delegate that represents the method to run.
A that represents the workflow instance.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，此方法由运行时调用，用于计划特定实例 ID 的工作项（回调）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method is called by the runtime to schedule a work item (callback) for a particular instance ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数创建在新线程中运行的委托方法。Use the constructor to create your delegate method to run in the new thread.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，此方法由运行时调用，用于计划在给定时间 () 执行的特定工作流实例的工作项（回调）。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this method is called by the runtime to schedule a work item (callback) for a particular workflow instance to be done at the given time ().
